name: 3.life
goal:
Our ultimate mission at 3.life is to enable better health for all people; through the catalysts of advisory services, digital health platform and innovative strategies. Enabled through our wide network of relationships and collaborations with scientific organizations.

3.life is focused on connecting health devices into a platform that performs analysis that is communicated to the patient on the one hand and provides detailed information to the HCP on the other hand.
Additionally 3.life is active in lobby with governments to optimise patient healthcare and affordability.
Last but not least 3.life is developing medical devices related to hart, glucose, blood pressure measurement.
interests: Digital economy and society, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Youth
euInitiatives:
New technologies
Innovation - R&D
Medical Devices
Artificial Intelligence
E-Health
